publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-500 Mr Andy Kerr: Nature Conservation (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Nature Conservation (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the act.

S2M-500 Mr Andy Kerr: Nature Conservation (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Nature Conservation (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act.
